New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers extended their best start in team history under new coach Kenny Atkinson.
Key Match Events: Cleveland Cavaliers center Jarrett Allen shot in front of Golden State Warriors forward Kevon Looney in the second half.
Cleveland Cavaliers guard Darius Garland hit a three-point basket in the second half.
Cleveland Cavaliers forward Evan Mobley shot as Golden State Warriors forward Trayce Jackson-Davis defended in the second half.
Cleveland Cavaliers guard Donovan Mitchell shot as Golden State Warriors forward Andrew Wiggins defended in the second half.
Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry shot as Cleveland Cavaliers guard Donovan Mitchell defended in the second half.
